ygData.subject: CE: proposed new character classes
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, it s time to ask for proposed new character classes that aren t promotions of existing characters or hybrids/dual class. I ll start things off with one

Yep, it's time to ask for proposed new character classes that aren't 
promotions of existing characters or hybrids/dual class.

I'll start things off with one new proposed class:

1)Alchemist - basic weapon ?
1st special - create potion of speed
2nd special - create potion of flight
3rd special - create potion of invisibility
4th special - create potion of invulvernability

No, an alchemist shouldn't be able to create potions of magic.  Think 
about it.
